abstract: Federal Judge Anita B Brody asks both NFL and former players who say league hid dangers of concussions to revise settlement deal; wants more former players to be eligible for benefits.
lead_paragraph: The federal judge overseeing the settlement between the league and 5,000 former players who accused the league of hiding the dangers of concussions requested revisions from both sides.

headline.main: Judge Asks for Revisions to Concussion Settlement
headline.print_headline: Judge Calls for Sides to Revise Settlement

snippet: The federal judge overseeing the settlement between the league and 5,000 former players who accused the league of hiding the dangers of concussions requested revisions from both sides.
